title: The Ultimate Way to do Zone 2 Training

transcript.full_text: in this video I will guide you through a straightforward yet effective approach to Zone 2 heart rate based workouts trainer day has launched an industry first feature that automatically controls the power to maintain your Optimum heart rate just like ERG mode does for power-based workouts as you may know heart rate based Zone 2 training has breached mainstream performance cycling my appreciation for the power of Zone 2 began over a decade ago spurred by the insightful endurance books written by Dr Phil maiton maf's pioneering Vision with the recent help of Coach San Milan is finally securing awareness for its remarkable Effectiveness in cycling performance once you've established your desired Target Zone 2 heart rate our simple training app takes the Reigns and automatically controls your power and your trainer to maintain your optimal heart rate for your training session at the heart of zone2 training lies the promise of building a robust aerobic base a foundation for your Fitness this type of training conditions your body to prioritize fat as a main fuel source enhancing your endurance and enabling you to ride for extended periods without succumbing to fatigue additionally Zone to training op optimizes your body's efficiency particularly in terms of oxygen transportation and utilization as a result over a period of extended Zoom 2 training most cyclists will notice a significant increase in endurance performance let's begin first we need to determine your upper Zone 2 heart rate limit as Dr maiton points out when it comes to Zone 2 training staying slightly below your upper Zone 2 limit provides a more predict able aerobic Improvement than when you exceed this limit for most people it may be hard at first to accept this but even going slightly over this limit regularly is likely to limit your aerobic progress the simplest method for finding your Zone to heart rate is just to use 65% of your maximum heart rate this provides a safe estimate for the majority of cyclists if you don't know your maximum heart rate I provided a link in the video description for a workout to help you accurately determine your maximum heart rate with the least amount of suffering a more accurate approach to finding your personal Zone to upper limit would be using a breathing test in this test you slowly increase the power in ERG mode on your trainer with the heart rate monitor or until you can feel your breathing start to change and you're talking slightly affected you need to talk out loud possibly to yourself in this this test once you have this value to be safe subtract 5 BPM as your target for your upper Zone 2 limit I provide a link to a free workout below to perform this test now let's get started with our first automatically controlled Zone 2 heart rate based workout let's start training click on quick start and when your devices are connected you can click on the HR button to begin start byess pressing plus or minus in our app until you set your target heart rate you can adjust how much this moves up and down in our settings then just pedal and your Zone 2 training is in progress because of its low intensity Zone 2 training is perfect for immersing yourself in a Netflix show or listening to an audio book good luck and I hope you can achieve your Optimum aerobic capabilities soon thanks
